column4: my "no space left on device" error is back! this time i have cleaned trash too as well as run apt-get autoclean but to no joy
i am running intrepid on 8gb pen drive!
I didn't see your initial question. How do you get the error?

well in short i installed a lot of updates through update manager. now there is an error of no disk space left whereas the fact is i have around 40% of space freeon my usb pen drive(i am running intrepid on pen drive 8gb)
